thread.title: Glencore shares slump 10 pct to new record low
thread.title_full: Glencore shares slump 10 pct to new record low

title: Glencore shares slump 10 pct to new record low
text:
Tip : Use comma (,) to separate multiple quotes. Learn more... 
Mon, Sep 28, 2015, 09:51 BST - UK Markets close in 6 hrs 39 mins Glencore shares slump 10 pct to new record low Reuters - UK Focus – 7 minutes ago 510.50 -3.5000 
LONDON, Sept 28 (Reuters) - Glencore (Xetra: A1JAGV - news ) shares sank more than 10 percent to a new record low on Monday, with the mining and trading company's drive to sell assets to cut heavy debts failing to soothe fears over slumping metals prices. 
Traders cited a bearish Investec (LSE: INVP.L - news ) note that raised doubts over Glencore's valuation if spot metal prices did not improve. The note pointed to high debt levels at the company. 
Shares (Berlin: DI6.BE - news ) of Glencore were down 10.0 percent at 87.49 pence at 0840 GMT after falling to a record low of 86.20. The stock is down around 70 percent year-to-date. (Reporting by Lionel Laurent; Editing by Sudip Kar-Gupta) Tax cuts, pensions, childcare, online accounts and beer duty, here's … Related Stock Articles Follow the quotes you care about most.
